Frontend Developer.

G'day, I'm Mayko! A developer with designer tendencies.

Who am I?

I am a frontend and fullstack developer focused on creating efficient digital solutions building dynamic and responsive interfaces. My passion for technology and innovation drives me to always seek the best in performance and usability. I’m ready to collaborate on projects that require creativity, technical expertise, and a commitment to delivering quality results.
